official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow
		  penalty-free withdrawals from the Federal Thrift Savings Fund to employees who
		  are furloughed as a result of the Federal budget sequester.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Employee Hardship Financial Relief Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Penalty-free
			 withdrawals from Thrift Savings fund to Federal employees furloughed as a
			 result of sequester

continuation-text.#text:

				furlough does not exceed the aggregate reduction in such individual’s

text.#text:
Distributions to an individual from the

The amendment made by
